Project 1
Week 2
1.- Multi class SVM
	- kernel function
  - Neural Networks
	- Keras/Tensorflow
	- Input Layers
	- Hidden Layers
	- Activation Function
	- Make a classifier
2. Xgboost + Oversampled_NB
	- The data after SMOTE technique is applied
	- Xgboost -> NB classifier -> Output Model
3. Prepare a column called 'Sentiment Score'
	- NLTK / Scikit Learn (Polarity Score)
	- Use the Sentiment Score' column in the model and check for performance

4. LSTM
	- Top Word
	- Embedding Length
	- Dropout
	- Epochs

5. Compare LSTM vs NB vs SVM vs Xgboost_Models

6. Hyper parameter finetuning to find optimum parameter for LSTM/GRU
	- Grid Search CV
	- Random Search
7,8 Topic Modelling
	- NLTK
	- NLTK + Gensim
	- Apply LDA Model
